message: Let's start with a simple split, Bob. A 60/40 split seems fair for a first offer.
I think a 55/45 split is a better starting point,  considering the inflation will affect us both.  Let's work towards a fair solution.
Bob, the inflation hurts you more than it hurts me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but 55/45 in my favor is the best I can do.
